hero.title: Powering businesses safely & efficiently
hero.subtitle: Licensed commercial electricians for offices, retail, warehouses, and industrial facilities. Electrical maintenance, repairs, installations, and emergency service. Minimize downtime. Keep your business running.

about.title: Commercial Electrical Experts
about.subtitle: Trusted by businesses since 2005
about.content: ProVolt specializes in commercial and industrial electrical services. Our licensed electricians handle everything from routine maintenance to complete electrical systems for new construction. Available 24/7 for emergencies.

products.name: Commercial Electrical Maintenance
products.description: Regular maintenance contracts to keep your electrical systems running smoothly. Prevent problems before they cause downtime.

products.name: Lighting Retrofit
products.description: Upgrade to energy-efficient LED lighting. Reduce energy costs by 50%+. Quick ROI. Includes rebate assistance.

products.name: Panel & Distribution Upgrade
products.description: Upgrade electrical panels and distribution systems for expanding businesses. Permits and inspections included.

products.name: Emergency Electrical Service
products.description: 24/7 emergency response for power outages, electrical failures, and urgent repairs. Minimize business downtime.

products.name: Tenant Improvement
products.description: Complete electrical for office build-outs and tenant improvements. Code-compliant and timely completion.

products.name: Industrial Motor & Control
products.description: Motor installation, repair, and control system work for industrial facilities. Minimize production downtime.

items.text: ProVolt handles all electrical for our three retail locations. Responsive, reliable, and always professional. The LED retrofit they did is saving us thousands annually.
items.author: Jennifer Martinez
items.title: Retail Chain Owner

items.text: When our warehouse had an electrical emergency, they responded within an hour and got us back online quickly. Now use them for all our electrical needs.
items.author: David Chen
items.title: Warehouse Manager

items.text: Completed our office build-out on time and on budget. Clean work, professional team, and passed all inspections first time. Highly recommend!
items.author: Sarah Thompson
items.title: Property Developer

members.name: James Rodriguez
members.title: Master Electrician & Operations Manager
members.bio: Licensed Master Electrician with 18+ years in commercial and industrial electrical work. Specializes in large-scale projects, maintenance contracts, and emergency service.
